::Striker::

Striker looks from Ratchet to Spears to Lunarpine. He nods at Lunarpine as a 
way of greeting, looking down at the device Spears had given him. He presses 
a button, a hologram of the Ark appearing.

Striker looks at Tranquility. "I think I'm in charge at the moment," he says, 
turning to the others.

"Allright, we need to build a complete replica of the Ark," he pauses as 
another panel falls from the cealing, "This one is dying. Blue Stinger hid 
the Autobots somewhere a long time ago, so a planetary scan will be needed to 
find them. We can use the pieces from the Keepers' ships, and spare parts 
from other wrecks to build it."
